item.description:
Meet someone in time for Valentine's Day! Valentine's Day is just around the corner so come out and mingle with some great singles and have a great time! Come early and enjoy some pre-event mingling, complimentary appetizers along with a cash bar featuring Orleans' great martinis and selection of beers. You'll have four 8-minute one-on-one conversations with four single professionals followed by an intermission where you can meet other singles that you may be interested in. After the intermission, you'll have another four 8-minute dates. We're so confident that 8minuteDating will work for you, that if you don't meet someone you want to see again, your next event is on us! What are you waiting for, sign up today using the links below!

Ages 25-35: 

http://8minutedating.com/signup/eventDescription.cgi?EID=20436

Ages 35-45:

http://8minutedating.com/signup/eventDescription.cgi?EID=20442

Special offer: Use the code 8mdnurahm20359 and get $8 off your first event :)
item.how_to_find_us: Call Nurah (I'll send my number out closer to the event)

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: 8minute Speed Dating at Orleans (Registration Required)
